website_summaries.verdict: Rated for Everyone, this Nintendo all-stars fighting title lets you play as your favorite character on a variety of stages.
pros: Features a wide range of characters to choose from, including Nintendo favorites such as Mario, Samus, Pikachu, and Sonic
Up to 8 players can play at a time either locally or online
Can play individually, or as teams
cons: There is no story mode here, which may disappoint some
Some buyers say the game arrived scratched, or not at all (box arrived empty)

website_summaries.verdict: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U is the total package that delivers on nearly every level. With a seemingly endless amount of replay value, Super Smash should be the one staple in every Wii U library.
pros: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U features fantastic chaotic fighting fun for up to eight simultaneous players and introduces tons of modes of play with an endless amount of replay value
cons: Smash Bros. isn't the most accessible game out of the gate
It could definitely use a deeper tutorial
Also, the Amiibo toy-to-life angle feels underwhelming

customer_reviews.title: Lacks longevity
customer_reviews.text: Now that Smash Ultimate is out, I can say this game is obsolete. It was fun while it lasted but there really isn't much reason for anyone to play it anymore. It does offer hundreds of hours of gameplay because you'll have to clear Classic mode 50 times, All Star mode 50 times and every other stupid side mode 50 times. Plus you get annoyingly specific challenges that are insanely difficult to do. Completing this will be really hard to do, so if you want a time waster, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great game with fun for the whole family!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about Super Smash games is that it is fun for the whole family. What I mean by that is that a 1 year old can hold the controller and move their character around a bit and not make anybody wait on them to finish (Mario kart). You all share the same screen too so no screen space is given up either for any number of players. You can even set teams to help out the little ones... or set them on their own team, either way. This Super Smash game is great on the graphics and has tons of character options. The gameplay is familiar to old timers of the series and just a great family game!
customer_reviews.author: ScottFam

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to play in the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: We tried several times to get this to play but it kept throwing an error code. The disc was spotless and not warped in anyway. It just would not play while all other games that we had played fine. We even bought another copy of the game from a local seller and it did the same thing. At the same time we bought another disc and that one played without incident. So, not sure what is going on but this one is a no-go. It is not the seller's fault but the manufacturer's!
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.title: If you loved the N64 version, you'll LOVE THIS TOO!
customer_reviews.text: If you loved it on N64, you'll love it on Wii U. And it's probably cheaper than the old N64 cartridges are. I would love to have that system and the games all over again, but I'm super happy with this game in this format for WiiU. My family loves it and we often 'fight' after dinner;) TONS of familiar scenes from other Nintendo games as choices for fighting grounds, the chance to unlock other characters, works with Amiibo figures, and etc. It's a great game;)
customer_reviews.author: Notjustasparrow

customer_reviews.title: It did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: The wii does not see the disc, we could not use it. I tried to return it or exchange it with the label provided by seller and UPS brought back the package saying it could not find the address. I am trying to contact the seller with no success. This was a Christmas present for my son about which, needless to say, we are all very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mami

customer_reviews.title: Not quite Melee, but then again nothing could ever live up to that.
customer_reviews.text: Melee is the best video game ever made. It's not possible to beat it. However, Nintendo came pretty close with this game. Wii U Smash is a worthy second place game IMHO. Pros: Graphics, Characters, Levels, Gameplay Cons: Online can be laggy, some of the classic characters' moves are slightly different, so I am forced to relearn how to play with them. For example, Falco's spike is timed differently, so I am constantly mis-timing my spikes with him. I think this was intentionally done to make the game feel different. This is the best game on the system, and a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Doofenshmirtz

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son's favorite game! Can't go wrong with Mario and Pokemon ...
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son's favorite game! Can't go wrong with Mario and Pokemon characters colliding in a game. He loves the option of being able to play other players through an internet connection. The inclusion of multiple game characters adds to the fun. The graphics are good, typical for Nintendo games. The rating is E10 probably because of violence, but that violence is among cartoon characters, does not involve blood like other games might, and isn't as much of a concern to me because of that. Definitely a great game that would be recommended by both of my children!
customer_reviews.author: T. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Game did not work. We returned the game within a few days. I only received $5.17 refund. It is ridiculous since the item was defective. The company should return the entire amount paid. I will no longer purchase any items from this dealer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great game even for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Super Smash Brothers is a time honored right of passage on Nintendo game systems. As most I was excited to play the newest version.More importantly my son who was turning 6 decided he had to have this game for his B-day. I made it so and have no regrets. SSB can be played as a button mashing game for kids of all ages. There are those who play in leagues and serious combos are known to them. Then there are those who like this game for its Rayman like fights among friends. This is one even mom can play since none of us have any clue what we are doing, yet we are having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Best Wii U game ever?
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest games for Wii U (arguably the current best), so if you own the console, just go ahead and click the BUY NOW button. It will never get pushed out of the top 5, so there's no reason not to own this game. PROS: + Massive improvement over Brawl's gameplay mechanics + Best character set ye + Massive type and number of gameplay modes + Amiibo compatibility + Highest resolution Smash + 60 frame per second + Fun online multiplayer experience Cons: - Isn't free - No Ice Climbers or Solid Snake
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Best Smash Bros Yet!!
customer_reviews.text: I will keep this short and sweet. If you enjoyed any previous Smash Bros. game...then this game is a MUST for you! The amount of playable characters and stages is insane....I was not expecting that many. The graphics are super sharp and the controls feel perfect. This has a ton of replay value with its challenges, multiple modes, and the 8-character melee!!.....yes you read that right...8!!! I HIGHLY recommend using a GameCube controller for the best playing experience possible!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disc nonfunctional
customer_reviews.text: I got this having never had an issue with preowned games. It sat around for awhile because I was busy with work and didn't have a chance to play it, and by the time I did the return period had ended. Long story short the disc is shot, I ended up having to buy it at full retail price on the Wii Store at short notice right before a party I had. Now I've just got a paperweight in a WiiU case.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Herman

customer_reviews.title: violent
customer_reviews.text: overpriced for the bad graphics, too much violence for young kids
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game that has a plethora of features
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game that has a plethora of features. One of the best games for the Wii U that you should absolutely get if you have a Wii U. A ton of paid DLC is available too, but you do not need to buy these to enjoy the game to the fullest. Additionally, if you do not get the paid DLC, you will still be able to play against people who have the paid DLC characters, you will just not be able to play as those characters. This is great because it means you can still enjoy the game to the fullest while not being separated from those who bought the DLC.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good update to the Series!
customer_reviews.text: I think this game is a vast improvement on the Wii version. I play this often with my teen son and he used to win most of the time. The fighting odds seem a bit more fair in this version. It is also full of new stages, characters, and makes good use of the graphics. There is a reason this game is voted one of the top 10 Wii U games of all time!. If you like the Mario franchise and lots of third party characters combined with fighting games, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Pom-May

customer_reviews.title: Great game for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing Smash Brothers since I could pick up an N64 controller. It has brought me closer to many family members and friends. I am in love with Nintendo and many of their creations, but SSB is definitely​ one of the best. I loved Melee to death and enjoyed Brawl, I was about to give up on the Wii-U until this came out. I sure am glad I have it now. It is just as enjoyable as always with a huge character roster and many stages. I love everything about it. The mechanics are almost flawless and smooth, it is an extremely enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Received Defected Copy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in “used - good” condition from a seller. When I inserted the disc I kept receiving this message no matter how many times I tried to clean the disc, eject and put it back in, etc. It appeared brand new but somehow the disc could not be read. This message did not pop up when I put in a different game for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Yang

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games in the market
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo did a good job with this game, this is the type of game where every day when you come home from school this is the first thing that you jump on. But now they have the Nintendo switch, and now they also have Super Smash Bros ultimate, so as much as I like to play this on my down time, and even though I don't play it as much as I used to, ultimately it's a fun game to play.
customer_reviews.author: Dontay

customer_reviews.title: The return of Smash!
customer_reviews.text: Smash is back! This time bigger than ever. The roster has more characters than before, you can do 8 player smash, numerous control options(Wii U Pad, Wii Controller, Gamecube, Pro Controller), the online is more robust and easier to use than Brawl. There are numerous game modes as well such as the traditional smash, events, a board game version, and more. The soundtrack is even bigger and lets you again customize what you hear in each stage or how often. The package is quite good and you definitely get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: MSMJ Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Awesome game. They knew what fans of the series ...
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 Awesome game. They knew what fans of the series wanted and they delivered perfectly. Original characters and some new: check! A lot of different stages and bring back old classics: Check! Change the movement speed from SSB Brawl to more fast like SSB Melee: Check! Improved the Online Modes and online Ranking system: Check! Bring back all the music, trophies, items, and Fun of the older SSB games: Check! Every once in awhile a game comes along that is totally worth Buying a whole system for. It's rare, but it happens! SSB For Wii U is THAT GAME for the Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre J.

customer_reviews.title: Round One... Fight!
customer_reviews.text: my kids (10 & 5) were addicted to Smash Bros for the Game Cube, so i thought is was only fitting to update them to the wii U version. Yep! Amazing! I even love battling them and learning all the moves for the different characters.So many more levels, characters and weapons. Sure to me a hit among friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brawl Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great smash game: lots of content and high skill ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an old Smash fan, I can say that this iteration is certainly worth picking up. A worthy predecessor to melee with 51 varied characters and very high skill ceilings. I also own all the downloadable content, (includes 7 extra fighters and extra maps) and it's overpriced for the amount of content, but the extra fighters are extremely fun to play. After picking up this game, expect long nights of sitting on the couch with friends trying to remember to turn your system off at a reasonable time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stupid tripping, ledge hogging is gone
customer_reviews.text: This is the definitive, high-def version of SSB we've all been waiting for. No stupid tripping, ledge hogging is gone, and the graphics are stunning. No framerate drops or slowdowns on the Wii U. Online gameplay has been outstanding for me. This is easily going to replace Melee as the version of choice in competitive circles. And this is instantly going to replace Brawl as your party game of choice for the casual crowd. Everything in the game is fantastic, go buy it.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vendor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used for my son. No scratches, and works great. My son played it the whole day! Thank you! You made my son very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Priscila Roman

customer_reviews.title: Super Smash Bros just got better.
customer_reviews.text: Super Smash Bros. is a well known game for anyone who has played on a Nintendo system. The Wii U version is not one that will let you down. It is great for playing single player and if you want to have a party. With the Wii U you can connect up to 8 controllers and it also supports the Amiibo characters allowing you to level them up and go against them or have them on your team. This is a great game with hours of gameplay and is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: lastoneleft

customer_reviews.title: The best Smash yet - Nintendo's going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Smash Bros Wii U is the best Smash Bros yet! I had already played the 3DS one, so I was already pretty good at it. I'm excited to start playing it with friends at parties and stuff! It's really exciting, and I haven't yet played all the modes that are available, but I will eventually. All the characters' movements are smooth, any moves I use are satisfying, and the visuals are beautiful! After all, for the first time, Smash Bros is in HD!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Clegg

customer_reviews.title: ... to the house really quick and the game is awesome on the Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Came to the house really quick and the game is awesome on the Wii U....👀🙀 We also purchased the Amiibos for my son as well... Really stuff! He beat almost every time and I always fall off the screens and die but it's really a cool game... I just wish Ice Breakers were still in there because that's who I use to use against my son on the first game for Wii... ❄️👍⛄️ My only complaint is there should be a selection for turning off the falling off the screen and losing! It's a cheap way to win!👎
customer_reviews.author: GT Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love the Graphics!!!  Great Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: The game has a ton of characters, several of which are able to be unlocked. We have only played with a total of four players, however you can play up to 8. The graphics are awesome and even with multiple players nobody lost track of their player. In order to play with friends and family, you may want to buy the Wii U Gamecube adapter that connects multiple Gamecube type controllers. We love the graphics and the HD really makes a difference!!! This is a purchase you will not regret!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Truly enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: It's come a long way from the N64 Super Smash! There is a lot more variety for single and multiple players, a plethora of players, and it proves to be a challenging and fun way to pass the time. My only complaint is that the skill set on some of these features is skewed pretty dramatically in favor of the CPU players, but I'm sure I'll find a way to correct that as I become more familiar with the game. All together, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: J.Ro

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics, Lots of Characters and Challenges, Very Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game as a present for a family member and it has been a wonderful game to play as a family. Super Smash Bros. brings together characters from many different games over the years so this game has been a bit nostalgic to play. Each new character brings new surprises to be discovered. The fights are quick and action packed so it is an ideal game to play as a family. Because it uses fun, animated characters this game is less violent then other similar fighting games. I would recommend this game for families as it is simple enough for children to play but also fun for adults who want to relive their childhood games.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Putman

customer_reviews.title: Great hype lives up to its name.
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play and all my friends enjoyed it. We played it 12 hours straight and the whole day literally flew by. If your a fan of brawl, you will definitely love this game. The graphics are 1080p and beautiful. Some maps I dislike and some are very good. Will give online mode a shot tonight. Some characters are certainly overpowered like Little Mac. But overall, a very well game. I am adding this to my brawl collection.
customer_reviews.author: A to Z Guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Incredible game!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. This game is so so good! I've played for hundreds of hours so far. Nintendo has packed so much content into this game. So much that It would take me hours to write it all down. Just a few examples: You can play up to 8-players, dozens of stages, customization, characters and weapons, wonderful music created from orchestras, amiibo support and more. Best Wii U game available!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: So many great things about this game
customer_reviews.text: So many great things about this game, wonderful sound and game design as well as characters. Only two issues Ive had after playing it for a few months. The enemy computer is very difficult and unforgiving on some levels or game types and the level design can get very dizzying; it goes all over the place (The hovering or moving maps are a hassle) BUT If you want a party game then you should buy this asap!
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 32 year old female who plays this game with my teenage daughters 10 & 14 and we can play for hours! Truly fun game and I haven’t sat down and played a game on their Wii U in ages
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super Smash Bros is bigger
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo does it again! Super Smash Bros is bigger, prettier, and smoother than ever. This is a must have game for any Wii U owners and especially fans of the previous games in the SSB series. I spent all of last weekend with some old high school friends gathered around on a couch and having a blast going at it in this brand new but comfortably familiar brawler. The online mode works well enough, but you just can't beat local multiplayer in a game like SSB. I highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Guinnesses

customer_reviews.title: OK game
customer_reviews.text: DIdn't find this game as fun as I was expecting. I've played other games in the series and found this to be a bit less exciting. The characters are pretty cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Holt

customer_reviews.title: The largest and best roster to date
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate Smash Bros! The largest and best roster to date. GORGEOUS graphics! Classic Smash gameplay! A MASSIVE collection of music from the greatest composers in the industry! Eight players all at once! Simple, but strangely addictive, Amiibo functionality! Customizable characters, including Mii integration for the first time! This is THE game that any serious game needs, and it's a great game for a casual party too! If you don't have a Wii U, then buy one.
customer_reviews.author: PaleoCollector

customer_reviews.title: Didn't love the last one on the Wii
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Melee for the Cube. Didn't love the last one on the Wii. This one is pretty cool, but I did feel like I completed most interesting aspects of the single player mode in about 5 days. I don't play online on the Wii, but multi player is entertaining when the buddies come by. The computers can offer some serious challenge, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Will A.

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE this game. They are 4 and 6 and the fact that they get so many choices of characters and options keeps them entertained for a long time. They would likely play it all day if I let them. It is easy enough for the younger one to play an still win occasionally but challenging enough to keep the older one interested. There are a few challenge characters that you have to beat to unlock in order to use them in battles, but most of the characters are available from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite game
customer_reviews.text: On time and as described. My son loves this game. It’s his favorite and go to
customer_reviews.author: Veritas M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A great 4th installment in the series. I love playing 8 person smash with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mason N.

customer_reviews.title: I run a Gamer's Club at school. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: I run a Gamer's Club at school. This is the only game they will play. It is incredibly frustrating considering I have a library of over fifty games.
customer_reviews.author: supergrafx

customer_reviews.title: BEST.GAME.EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST.GAME.EVER!!!!! Seriously, this game is so fun and addicting! It never gets boring. So many characters too choose from and to unlock. Buy this for anyone and everyone you know, you will fill their holidays with joy! Even our 3.5 y.o daughter loves this game. Any age will enjoy this game, it is so easy to learn. Now go SMASH!!!
customer_reviews.author: BowserJagerTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: but this game was a serious hit as a Christmas present --It deserves 10 stars because not only did my 9 yr old love it (who I bo
customer_reviews.text: I know very little about todays video games, but this game was a serious hit as a Christmas present --It deserves 10 stars because not only did my 9 yr old love it (who I bought the game for), but also my 21 yr old son and 18 yr old daughter as well. Serious sheiks of delight could be heard when this gift was opened. What could be better than that?
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to love it. I can't speak from personal experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson. Requested it by name. Seems to love it. I can't speak from personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty M. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sibling Bonding!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's birthday. My son plays it all the time on our Wii U. He loves this game. Him and my daughter always play this game together, and I think it's a perfect sibling bond. If your children don't usually play together, this might turn that around! I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Settle it in SMASH! Seriously, just do it.
customer_reviews.text: Duh, it's Super Smash Bros. 4 (For Wii U) *ahem* subtle Nintendo marketing ploy aside... This game is fantastic and a must buy for any Nintendo fans out there. If you own a Wii U then buy this game. Alternatively, this game is best played with a Gamecube controller, but good luck getting the adapter now! LOL! Best Nintendo product you can't find because they already stopped making them!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, tons of cool new stuff
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, tons of cool new stuff, but they changed too much from Melee... the controls, the battle speed, just so many small changes. I love this game, but me and my brother still prefer Melee when we wanna get REAL competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an Amazing Game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. I highly encourage everyone who has a Wii U to get this game. I got a Wii U specifically for this game, and it was well worth it. It is very much a party game and not as fun by yourself, but you'll have loads of fun playing with other people. The graphics are amazing and the roster taken from Nintendo's rich history is fantastic. A must have for any Nintendo fan.
customer_reviews.author: Aricka

customer_reviews.title: "A great mix of 'Brawl' and 'Melee' "
customer_reviews.text: "Super Smash Bros. for Wii U" is essentially a great mix of "Brawl" and "Melee" with even more characters and even more stages! The difficulty is also a lot more challenging, especially with Classic Mode. Not only are the graphics great, but even the GUI is creative and lovely! THIS GAME IS REALLY GOOD. Perhaps one day there will be a "Project M"-esque hack for it, too. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E.

customer_reviews.title: 11 yo boy's review
customer_reviews.text: It's super fun! You can smash people. It's fun for the whole family to play together and one of my favorite games. You can use amiibos with it!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Get this game today, like now!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your a fan of the series you know this version has been a long time coming. This game is in one word huge. In every aspect of the game, the roster list, the modes of play, the characters moves, the stages, and all in glorious HD. Whether you like local multiplayer or online play you don't have to choose they're both here. Tons of trophies and unlockables. Even has stage builder, and a new gameboard mode. Very intense, fun and challenging in any mode, with butter smooth gameplay at 60fps. This game is also compatible with amiibo. You can play with gamepad, pro controller or wii mote.
customer_reviews.author: Gamerrr72

customer_reviews.title: I haven't played Super Smash Brothers since I owned a N64
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played Super Smash Brothers since I owned a N64. I just got a Wii U as an early birthday gift and knew I needed to get this. I'm really impressed with the new characters they have and how you can interact with the amiibo. I'm not a hard-core player by any means but I really enjoy a good fighting multiplayer game where I can play as a Pokemon.
customer_reviews.author: Pawpadamus

customer_reviews.title: YEP.
customer_reviews.text: This game erases in my mind the travesty that was the previous Smash Bros. This is the best time you will have with some friends and a game console. If you have one annoying friend who tells you pikachu could totally kick Mario's ass, then tell them to prove it. P.S, Diddy Kong is a stone cold killer, but Link all day.
customer_reviews.author: I Buy Stuff

customer_reviews.title: A hit in this house
customer_reviews.text: What a great game. The 8 player capability is pretty awesome, and the graphics have improved quite a bit. Most importantly, the game is fun. My son and I come back to this one over and over again, and it's something the whole family can play. Great game to continue the series! Creating your own Wii characters is a nice touch too. Really brings out the creativity in my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Not a great game, really
customer_reviews.text: Not a great game, really. Repetitive and not very fun. My husband who this was a gift for played maybe twice. Arrived fast and in good condition though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam.Clever

customer_reviews.title: What a fun game. My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: What a fun game. My husband loves it. I'm not really into fighting games, but after months of owning it, I decided to try it out. I caught on really quickly and it's something fun for us to do together and for our friends that also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Larson

customer_reviews.title: I Respect the Seller
customer_reviews.text: Despite the package arriving slightly damaged to my dismay. The seller of this item was very willing to return this item to me without any trouble. I now have one that works and I highly recommend this game. The game is great for the family, and great for friends. It is easy to learn, and anyone can play! So without further ado get this item. He is a legit seller, and if the product does not arrive how you liked it there will be no hassle in returning it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. Feel like it’s a burned disc 😡
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha Walker

customer_reviews.title: best game ever
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game. nintendo did a great job of developing this one. It allows for competitive play such as in melee and at the same time can just be played for fun with friends who have never played before. Active devs releasing patches and awesome new DLC all the time. Just downloaded mewtwo!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Such a Fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a super smash bros fan since I was a kid. The gameplay is intense, while offering all the same characters the original has offered. I'm a fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel james glenn gaffey

customer_reviews.title: SSB is fun (but may take time to master)!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Super Smash Bros. (SSB) game. Up until purchasing this game, I didn't have any experience with SSB, but I am pleased so far. Being a novice, there is much to learn, especially when playing against better players! With that said, my initial impression is 4/5 stars. This may change (increase to 5 stars) as I learn the game.
customer_reviews.author: Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times for the WII U
customer_reviews.text: Great smash game for its generation. Still a decent buy if you have the system.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: my son LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Don't even get me started on this...I thought my son was going to die waiting all those days for the release...everyday we had the melodramatic count down to release day...Glad it arrived on the release date, Amazon does great in getting them here if you pre-order, you can have it arrive on the date of release, my son LOVES IT
customer_reviews.author: K. E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Game Super Smash Bros
customer_reviews.text: The game is in excellent condition. I recommend the seller. My son is very happy. Best regards from Panamá.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Real or fake?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game and received it with a blue circle in corner, took off sticker to find that it is a UAE Saudi Arabia Malaysia Singapore Official Product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Melee, way better than Brawl
customer_reviews.text: My personal opinion is that Brawl was a step down from Melee- probably it's because I tried playing it with a Wii Classic Controller. Either way, I stopped playing brawling after a few days, when I had spent months with Melee. SSB Wiiu feels like a return to form- tight controls and weeks of fun. The lack of an extensive single player mode is missed, however.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this game have the one on switch but they wanted this one for they room
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne

customer_reviews.title: great party game
customer_reviews.text: If you have played smash brothers before you will be happy with it. If you haven't then get ready to live. There are few better party games than smash brothers. I had a party with a bunch of guys at work and some wives. We had one tv of smash brothers and another of mari cart. Everyone was happy. Hours of fun with 8 people playing at once. 12 if you count mari cart.
customer_reviews.author: Private Person

customer_reviews.title: Fun family fun
customer_reviews.text: Was this games for kids because my husband and I loved it. Usually I am not much of a video gamer but I liked this game a lot...reminded me of a much MUCH MUCH tame PG version of mortal kombat with none of the gore etc that I cringe at in my mature age
customer_reviews.author: Pikkin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This game is awsome and a blast to play with the kids. Shipped and delivered very fast. It was used but the case and disc looked brand new. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my older kids, not for the younger set.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to play this but it was way to intense for my 5 year old. My fault, it is rated 10+ but some other 10+ games have been able to slip by, not Smash Brothers. To much combat with no story line. My little guy gets to wait.
customer_reviews.author: E. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game with great local multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Local multiplayer is hard to find in the Wii/Wii U games nowadays and this one fits the bill. Kids received this as a Christmas present and it is one of the games they play the most right now. We have quite a few, including Rayman (both for Wii and Wii U, all of the Mario Bros., etc,) but this one gets a lot of play. The online multiplayer is good too.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Smash Brothers Excellence!
customer_reviews.text: With Smash Bros. for Wii U, Nintendo offers a meticulous and generous game, technically stunning and with an indestructible replay value, whether playing alone or with friends, in local or online multiplayer. If entertainment is a science, Smash Bros. for Wii U deserves the Nobel Prize!
customer_reviews.author: majario

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo never stops giving!
customer_reviews.text: Oh this game. Nintendo has once again stepped up their game! This game is filled with competitive & fun atmosphere across all aspects within this game! I played this game a multitude of times with my nephew and he beats me EVERY SINGLE TIME! I have been playing this game for many months now, and I can assure you - it's worth every penny! If you're looking for many hours of entertainment with no stop, Super Smash Brothers 4 is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Logan O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: It's Smash, just get it!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say that thousands of others have already said? It is a phenomenal game, easily game of the year candidate. It has an abundance of modes and extras to keep players playing for months. With amiibo integration, theres even more fun to be had as people can watch them fight for them in matches. Definitely the best game you can get for the system!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Soldier 93

customer_reviews.title: My son wanted this game so bad it is the reason we upgraded to the Wii ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this game so bad it is the reason we upgraded to the Wii U and he LOVES it and his buddies come over and they LOVE it. If only Nintendo could get their act together and provide enough amiibos everyone would want this game but even without the amiibos if you loved the first Super Smash for the Wii from years ago you'll be glad you got this one too!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy2shop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video game
customer_reviews.text: For a long time my son wanted this video game ... I was not disappointed, many hours of fun and ease to choose the kind of fight, one on one or groups against groups ... highly recommended for children of 10 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I guess I was the only one who liked those. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: I have been really enjoying playing this game. Although I do have to say I miss tournaments and Subspace Emissary from Brawl. I guess I was the only one who liked those. Other than that, it is a lot of fun day after day with a high replayability.
customer_reviews.author: Tsukikomew

customer_reviews.title: I haven't played this much because it isn't as fun single player but when I have people over it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played this much because it isn't as fun single player but when I have people over it's awesome to play.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Roth

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Smash Bros
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game with beautiful graphics and a great game mode. The selection of characters is awesome and it is very fun to play the 8 players fights. This will be one of the jewels for Wii U
customer_reviews.author: Oswualdo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Best game on Wii u.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Wii u you need this game. The game series was always excellent but things got stepped up here. The fighting is better. The stages are better. And the character roster is just crazy. And with the dlc they have released it only gets better. I have put in hundreds of hours and still come back. And with cloud and a few others coming I will keep coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for 3DS. Buy this instead.
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than Smash for 3DS. Good graphics and decent controls with many play options and tons of characters. For 3DS has garbage graphics with impossible controls. So bland. Pick this up.
customer_reviews.author: MinhcallaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: SSB4 > Original unmodified Melee
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd regret buying this as I immediately regretted buying Brawl, but nope. The story mode is sorely missed, but the character list, stage list, and online that actually works - I don't see myself ever needing an SSB5.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: I HATE the new Classic Mode (the version on the 3DS was WAAAAY better). I wish they had a story mode like in Brawl... and the fact that most of the roster is already unlocked at the beginning takes a lot of the fun out of it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Dahl-Lacroix

customer_reviews.title: Fun game too much exciting to list.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game with too many fun things about it. With the amiibos it gains even more fun. The fighting can be furious and fast or a game of cat and mouse that takes a while due to the size of some maps. Some maps have tricks to make it easier to win, some maps are crazy hard to not just die on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reinstein

customer_reviews.title: Gamer gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son. He offers nothing but positive feedback about the game.
customer_reviews.author: thelast6months

customer_reviews.title: Great game with an amazing amount of content packed in!
customer_reviews.text: Never played a Smash Bros game before, so this is the 1st one my kids and I have played. Amazing game with a vast amount of different games and replay-ability. Plus you don't need to be a fighting game expert to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Vale

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed all my friendships. Would play again
customer_reviews.text: As always, this is a super fun party game to play with your friends and family. This game inspired me to go and build a hi-def projector set up for the ultimate butt whooping experience with that seven player smash. The game itself has a TON of features like wow, what CAN'T you do in this game?
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved Graphics and New Characters are a Win
customer_reviews.text: According to my 12 year old, this game is fantastic. He has been playing the series for a while now and has gone back and played some of the older games on the N64 as well. He loves the new graphics quality and the addition of several new characters and playing modes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Saved money buying used!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this game and I like playing it too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Fast paced, frenzied, chaotic fun.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing fighting game, packed with a ridiculous amount of content from all the classic and modern Nintendo titles, as well as some outside of the big N's umbrella. A gigantic character roster with a great variety of characters, some with their own individual traits intact (ex. Kirby can copy each fighter's special move, Shulk can switch between his different Monado arts). Beautiful 1080p 60fps presentation, tons of trophies to collect, an awesome soundtrack full of remixes, arrangements, and original tracks, and much more. This is hands-down the Wii U title of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo best game
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Like always Nintendo makes great game and I think Nintendo took Super SMASH BROS to the next level. Cons: The only thing that I don't like is that you cant talk to your opponent while you play online.
customer_reviews.author: Felix L

customer_reviews.title: Worth it in terms of usage
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this for Christmas, my kid has never failed to play the game every day - even just one round or two. So if I will calculate the cost over the number of times used, this game is totally worth it. My boys can't get enough of it. They play interactively with other kids from other countries.
customer_reviews.author: marshall pond

customer_reviews.title: Always a great game!
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say, it's a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Herman

customer_reviews.title: but truly this is the best smash yet
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't prepared for this game, but truly this is the best smash yet. The only complaint is the new target test they have you do and there isn't an adventure mode either, but other than those 2 things it's a great game not to be missed
customer_reviews.author: mana2jay

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of our favorite games. We have enough remotes to play with 8 people and we use it as often as we can. My kids love to play this with friends. When friends come over for parties, this is a great game for kids and adults alike.
customer_reviews.author: SS Sally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Game
customer_reviews.text: Just like the old Smash games. The perfect companion for any get-togther with friends and family. Everyone knows this game and it is a great time to spend with others to have some nice clean fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! It is so much fun to play alone, in a group, or online! I'm never upset when playing SSB4 (except trying to beat All-Star on hard with Olimar/Villager so I can finally get the last challenge). The online is amazing and rarely lags. Probably the best SSB!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall E.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly, and my son was thrilled with his birthday present. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meyer

product_meta.title: Super Smash Bros. - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo Wii U| Edition:StandardBattle it out as Nintendo's greatest heroes on the Wii U console Face off against the biggest roster of Nintendo all-stars ever assembled! Send your rivals flying with powerful attacks to earn all-new customizations and equipment that trick out your fighter's moves and stats. Then power-up and train intelligent amiibo figures* to take on your friends! The multiplayer showdown** you know and love is now on the Wii U console! Take on all comers as Mario, Mega Man, Sonic, and more gaming greats. Or tap an amiibo* to the Wii U GamePad controller to train it up by battling with or against it. You can even pit your amiibo against a friends' to see how your training methods stack up. *amiibo figures sold separately ** Broadband Internet access required for online play. Learn more on Nintendo website
feature_bullets: Super Smash Bros. Mario! Link! Samus! Pikachu! All of your favorite Nintendo characters are back along with plenty of new faces in Super Smash Bros. for Wii U the next entry in the beloved Super Smash Bros. series. Up to four players can battle each

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,223 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
